page.title: 10BOOKS
page.content: Enid Blyton is a famous author for children of the age of 7 to 11.Girls especially like her school books and her mysteries are an all round favourite. Roald Dahl is also very popular and is well known for his fantasy books which are enthralling for young children. We went to interview a lady living in Welford - On - Avon about her favourite books. She likes reading Historic Novels and Autobiographies - coming across these books at school and enjoying them.She was able to read properly between the ages of five and six. She likes the author Nigel Nicolson because she can find his books interesting in a couple of pages.She considers reading to be a hobby. * By Hannah and Kelda*
